name: 1000 Cookies
description:
1000 Cookies is a simple and addicting puzzle game for everyone! 

It is easy and relaxing to play, but try to use the full power of your strategic thinking and logic to get the best results. 

Fun and effective way to train your brain! 

FEATURES
- colorful and simple puzzle game
- worldwide leaderboard
- neat design
- free game with no limits
